## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                         | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Default           |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | The text alignment of the component.                                | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `'left'`          |
| `color`    | `color`    | Basic text color variations.                                        | `"inherit" \| "neutral-grey-1" \| "neutral-grey-2" \| "neutral-grey-3" \| "neutral-grey-4" \| "neutral-grey-5" \| "neutral-grey-6" \| "neutral-grey-7" \| "neutral-grey-8" \| "porsche-black" \| "porsche-light" \| "porsche-red"` | `'porsche-black'` |
| `ellipsis` | `ellipsis` | Adds an ellipsis to a single line of text if it overflows.          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`           |
| `inline`   | `inline`   | Sets the text as display: inline.                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`           |
| `tag`      | `tag`      | Set a custom HTML tag depending of the usage of the text component. | `"a" \| "address" \| "blockquote" \| "cite" \| "div" \| "figcaption" \| "label" \| "legend" \| "p" \| "span" \| "sub" \| "sup" \| "time"`                                                                                          | `'p'`             |
| `type`     | `type`     | The style of the text.                                              | `"copy" \| "small" \| "12" \| "16" \| "18" \| "20" \| "24" \| "28" \| "30" \| "32" \| "36" \| "42" \| "44" \| "48" \| "52" \| "60" \| "60-thin" \| "62" \| "62-thin" \| "72" \| "72-thin" \| "84" \| "84-thin"`                    | `'copy'`          |
| `wrap`     | `wrap`     | Wraps the text, even when it has to break a word.                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`           |
